import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Routes, Route, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Phone, Mail, MapPin, Calendar, Users, Award, BookOpen, Star, ChevronRight, Menu, X, Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, GraduationCap, Clock, Globe, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; import TeacherLogin from './TeacherLogin'; import StudentLogin from './StudentLogin'; import './index.css'; // Helper component to scroll to top on route change function ScrollToTop() { const { pathname } = useLocation(); useEffect(() => { if (!pathname.includes('#')) { window.scrollTo(0, 0); } }, [pathname]); return null; } // Main School Website Component function SchoolWebsite() { const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); const handleTeacherLogin = () => { window.location.href = '/teacher-login'; }; const handleStudentLogin = () => { window.location.href = '/student-login'; }; // Auto-rotate hero slides useEffect(() => { const timer = setInterval(() => { setCurrentSlide((prev) => (prev + 1) % 3); }, 5000); return () => clearInterval(timer); }, []); const heroSlides = [ { title: "专 拽驻住 爪注专 ", subtitle: " 转, 注转 专 转", image: "" }, { title: " 转 砖转 转", subtitle: "转 转拽转 砖转 专 砖转", image: "" }, { title: "拽 转转", subtitle: " 爪专 住 注爪", image: "" } ]; const stats = [ { number: "850+", label: "转 驻注", icon: }, { number: "65+", label: "专 住", icon: }, { number: "25+", label: "砖转 住", icon: }, { number: "98%", label: "砖注转 专爪 专", icon: } ]; const programs = [ { title: "转 ", description: "转转 '-' 注 砖 注 驻转 砖专 砖 爪专转转", subjects: ["转拽", "注", "", "转"], icon: "" }, { title: " 注", description: " 转 专转 注 砖 驻住专", subjects: ["驻拽", "", "砖", ""], icon: "" }, { title: "转 转", description: "转 转 转 注转 转注砖转 转拽转", subjects: ["专拽", "拽注", "注爪", "转"], icon: "" }, { title: "注砖专 ", description: " 专 砖 驻注转 驻转 砖专转 转", subjects: ["住驻专", "住拽", "转专", "注"], icon: "" } ]; const facultyMembers = [ { name: " 爪专", position: " 转 住驻专", experience: "25 砖转 住 专 ", description: "拽专 , 转 砖转 驻转", image: "┾" }, { name: " 拽", position: " ", experience: "20 砖转 住 专转 注", description: " 拽专转 专转 注", image: "ㄢ" }, { name: "转 爪专", position: "专转 转", experience: "12 砖转 住 ", description: " 砖 ", image: "┾" } ]; const testimonials = [ { name: "专 专", role: "专 转 转 壮", content: "转 住驻专 拽驻住 爪注专 砖 转 转 砖. 转驻转转 驻 爪专 拽转 转 注转 爪.", rating: 5 }, { name: " ", role: "专 2023", content: "专 专拽 , 转 驻转 . 拽转 住住 转 砖注专 拽.", rating: 5 }, { name: " ", role: "专 转 转 壮", content: "砖 砖转 转住转 转 驻专 . 砖 转 转 住驻专 砖专.", rating: 5 } ]; const recentNews = [ { date: "15 专 2025", title: "转 拽 专砖 转专转 专拽 专爪转", summary: "爪转 专拽 砖 转 住驻专 拽 专砖 转专转 专拽 专爪转 注 驻专拽 砖 砖 专 拽 ." }, { date: "10 专 2025", title: "砖拽转 注转 砖", summary: " 注 砖 注 爪 转拽 砖驻砖专 转 拽专 转 转 注." }, { date: "5 专 2025", title: "驻转转 专砖 砖转 转砖驻状", summary: "驻转 专砖 砖转 . 拽转 - 爪 专砖 拽." } ]; return (
